participant_abstract.sent: The meeting started with the (brief) minutes of the previous one.
There were three presentations, by the ME, the UID and the ID (myself), followed by a discussion.
We finished by agreeing the next tasks for each member of the team.

participant_actions.sent: UID: more on the interface design.

participant_decisions.sent: Consider including a speech recognition function in the device (but cost implications?).
Keep the interface design simple: a few big buttons, colourful (company colours).
Look into using a built-in rechargeable battery as the power source .
Look at selling via TV manufacturers.
Aim at the younger age group, esp 18-25 yrs.

participant_problems.sent: Very uncertain of what we can actually afford to do, having no experience of what components etc cost.
